definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: At the end of last month, it had 7 projects for pre-sales.
sentences.chinese: 截至上月底止，集团有7个项目可预售。

sentences.english: Sales up to and including last month amounted to  ￡10000.
sentences.chinese: 销售额至上月底为止达10000英镑。

sentences.english: Lee So-ra, a 51-year-old mother crossed at the end of last month.
sentences.chinese: 李索拉是位母亲，上月底穿越了边境。

sentences.english: He finally returned at the end of last month and had only made two starts before his ankle trouble.
sentences.chinese: 他在上月底王者归来，但仅仅先发两场就又伤了。

definition: late last year/the end of last year
the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous
end of month/late in the month
start of month/early in the month
to stay level (of exchange rate, market share etc)/fair/unbiased
